file_content.text: Got a little engine trouble.
Okay, a lot.
It's good to finally get out of there. Thanks.
Appreciate the pickup.
Hold onto your gratitude. We're not even close to safe.
Let me take the controls. I can get us to safety.
Let me pilot.
Sure you heard I'm a bit of a pilot myself. Give me the controls.
I should fly this thing.
Get up so I can set this thing down in one piece.
Let me fly.
I've got it.
You do know what you're doing?
Are you even a pilot?
Hi. You're welcome, by the way.
Guns locked on!
Get us out of here!
Trying to!
Come on... come on....
Guns = offline / T7 = start new mission
Whoo!
Thank you, Teeseven! We owe you one.
Yeah, really.
Lament: No one has thanked me.
I appreciate the save.
Thanks.
Humility: It was nothing.
Okay....
You look familiar--kind of.
You must be an HK series droid. I have one... somewhere.
I went up against an HK unit before. He wasn't like you.
You look like an HK series droid. I don't think I've ever seen one quite like you.
[Say nothing]
Salutation: Greetings. I am HK-55, fully armed for combat and at your command.
Good to know.
I told you we'd succeed.
You left out the part where I'd lose my ship.
I was with others before Arcann attacked. What happened? Why were you and Teeseven the only ones to come for me?
Where are my friends?
What you said about the Republic--is it truly that bad? Any word from my travel companions?
Where are my people?
I can only tell you as much as I know, Master Jedi.
Lana, what's happened to the Republic? Is the government intact? And where's Havoc Squad?
Where's my team?
Understand there's only so much I can shed light on, Major.
Better get started. It's going to be a short trip, and you've got five years of galactic hell to cover.
Noticed you didn't bring any of my crew along. They're putting together a jailbreak party for me, right?
Where are my pals?
Right?
You have to tell me what's happened to the Empire. And you haven't explained why my people weren't assisting you.
Where are my allies?
I would have words with the Dark Council. Set up a call, and reach out to my associates as well.
Fetch my allies.
My lord....
Got some friends I'm sure are worried about me, a few open bounties. Think I'll head back to Imperial space.
I need to find my friends.
"Open bounties." Right.
What's the status of Sith Intelligence? And do you know the whereabouts of my associates?
My team isn't with you.
Your concerns are... understandable, Commander.
Lana, I don't know if you've heard yet, but the Emperor--he killed Darth Marr.
Darth Marr's dead.
Yes, his absence has been felt by many.
For quite some time, right?
You have to land this thing before we fall out of the sky.
Land the ship, Koth.
I told you I've got it. Not my first time flying half a wreck.
I've got it all under control.
It's going to be a short trip. Might want to start briefing your friend here on what's been going on the last five years.
HK, make yourself useful. Check the stabilizers.
Five years?
High Justice Vaylin! Please! There was no way I could possibly--
Aaaaaa!
Are you awaiting instruction?
Much better.
The Outlander?
No, she's gone.
No, he's gone.
Gone?
I don't care what it takes. I want her found.
I don't care what it takes. I want him found.
Tanek! Run! We'll fight another day!
You Knights, you're never taught to properly channel your anger.
If you're going to kill me, then kill me.
That's not happening.
Let him go.
Turn him loose.
Let him go.
So he can come after us again?
Not what I'd call a sound strategy.
He was unarmed. End of story.
He was defenseless.
After what that reactor did, you draw the line at one helpless aggressor. The carbonite must have done a number on your head.
Maybe I should go back, confirm I didn't thaw out the wrong block of carbonite.
Blinding morality. You're going to get us killed, you know that, don't you?
There will be a need for loyal allies once I control this world. He'll remember I was good to him.
It's for when I rule Zakuul.
I'll have need of his kind once I've seized the throne. He'll remember this moment.
It's for when I rule Zakuul.
It would help to have some locals owe me a favor if I'm mounting a coup.
It's for when I rule Zakuul.
Figure when I'm in charge of this place I'll need people like that on my side.
It's for when I rule Zakuul.
Ambitious all of a sudden, are we? Your time in hibernation must have been something.
I don't want to say you're aiming too high, but perhaps you're getting ahead of yourself.
My reasons are just that--mine.
Don't question me.
You ought to remember why you're not a carbonite corpse right now.
Lana.
Go ahead, Lana. Kill him.
He wasn't armed. Hardly seems your style.
Seems your time in hibernation had an effect on you.
He would have come back to fight again.
He was bound to return.
That he would. I wonder what other surprises you hold up your sleeve.
This is who I am now. Get used to it.
It's the new me.
You know, I just might.
If they're going to help Arcann rule the galaxy, they're not worth sparing.
Arcann represents evil.
Either they're against Arcann or they cease to exist. Simple as that.
You work for Arcann, you die.
The way I see it, they fight for Arcann, they get no mercy. Not from me.
Arcann's people die.
Bear in mind, you would have seen me as your enemy once. Not everyone's agenda is set in stone.
Fair enough, though it never hurts to keep an open mind about these things. Potential allies are everywhere.
That won't be the last Knight we encounter.
Let Arcann send every last one of them. They're all as good as dead.
Bring them on.
You'd have your work cut out for you, I can assure you of that.
That's because Arcann's afraid to face me himself. He should be.
Arcann is scared.
No offense, but I'm willing to bet the only person Arcann ever feared was his father.
So long as I get a chance to recover first.
A rest would be nice.
Just so long as I can kick back and take a break from all this running around.
A rest would be nice.
Somehow, I don't think that will be an option.
Vaylin.
I don't know you. But you, I've seen you....
I'll hold her off as long as I can. The first chance you get--go.
I've been hunted long enough. I'm not going anywhere.
I'm done running.
No way am I leaving you behind.
I stand with you.
You're impossible.
I'll say a kind word in your memory.
It's your funeral....
I'll be sure to raise a drink in your honor.
It's your funeral....
Cute.
No, I won't need that.
Heads down, eyes open, run like hell!
Come on!
Whoa!
Declaration: Meatbags can't fly.
Hang on! I'm going to punch it!
We're going to be fighting against their new emperor. He'll tell them we're monsters. I want to show them something different.
Showing mercy can win allies.
We can worry about public relations after you're safely away from here.
